import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; import { ServiceService } from '../services/service.service'; import { LoanData } from 'src/models/LoanData'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin', templateUrl: './admin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin.component.css'], }) export class AdminComponent { loanData: LoanData[] = []; constructor(private service: ServiceService, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getCustomers().subscribe({ next: (data) => { this.loanData = data; }, error: (e) => { alert('Failed due to Network Error'); }, }); } logOut() { Swal.fire({ title: 'Are you sure?', text: "You won't be able to revert this!", icon: 'warning', showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonColor: '#3085d6', cancelButtonColor: '#d33', confirmButtonText: 'Yes, LogOut!', }).then((result) => { if (result.isConfirmed) { Swal.fire('LogOut!', 'Your are Logout...', 'success'), localStorage.removeItem('email'), this.router.navigateByUrl('/login'), console.log('Log Out Success'); } }); } }
